name: src/components/event.js
src/components/options.js
src/config/console.js
src/config/event-types.js
content:
export const EVENT_PAGEVIEW = 'pageview';
export const EVENT_CLICK = 'click';

name: src/index.js
isReady
description: Get status of the testing tool

name: isReady
description: Set status of the testing tool

name: extractQueryParams
description: Get query parameters from window.Location object if needed

name: initialize
description:
Initialize testing:
use this when loading the page for the first time

name: loadExperiments
description:
Go through experiments and load only the relevant experiments
based on visitor main bucket and if query params are present

name: filterVariationsWithBucket
description:
Go through each experiment and filters their variation to
reduce to 1 based on visitor bucket

name: filterWithView
description: Check visitor view options and check if qualified for given experiment

name: filterWithSegment
description: Check visitor segment options and check if qualified for given experiment

name: qualifyView
description: Qualify visitor for given experiment based on current view (URL)

name: qualifySegment
description: Qualify visitor for given experiment based on segment

name: getMainTrafficBucket
description: Retrieve or generate main traffic bucket for visitor

name: getExperimentBucket
description: Get a traffic bucket for a given experiment

name: shouldForceQueryParams
description: Should the query params be forced?

name: track
description: Track an event to Variate Reporting API

name: src/lang/debug.js
src/lang/errors.js
src/lang/version.js
src/utilities/env.js

content:
# Variate Engine

Variate AB testing engine for modern applications. 

https://variate.ca

## Information

Variate Engine is not built to work in a standalone mode in the browser. The engine must be wrapped into a plugin/package
for another JavaScript library such as [Vue](https://github.com/variateapp/variate-vue), React, Angular, etc.

## API
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "@variate/engine",
  "version": "1.0.1",
  "description": "Variate AB testing engine for modern applications",
  "main": "dist/variate.js",
  "module": "dist/variate.esm.js",
  "files": [
    "dist"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "flow": "flow check",
    "build": "npm run clean && rollup -c rollup.config.js",
    "dev": "npm run clean && rollup -w -c rollup.config.js",
    "clean": "rimraf dist/",
    "lint": "eslint src/",
    "lint:fix": "eslint --fix src/",
    "docs": "esdoc",
    "prepublishOnly": "npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build",
    "publish": "npm publish --access public",
    "test": "jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=tests/support/jasmine.json --reporter=jasmine-console-reporter"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+ssh://git@github.com/variateapp/variate-engine.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "ab-testing",
    "variate"
  ],
  "author": "Valentin Prugnaud <valentin@whatdafox.com>",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/variateapp/variate-engine/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/variateapp/variate-engine#README.md",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.5.5",
    "@babel/core": "^7.5.5",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.5.5",
    "@babel/preset-flow": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/register": "^7.5.5",
    "babel-eslint": "^10.0.2",
    "babel-plugin-transform-flow-strip-types": "^6.22.0",
    "chai": "^4.2.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-flow-type-plugin": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^6.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-flowtype": "^3.13.0",
    "flow-bin": "^0.104.0",
    "jasmine": "^3.4.0",
    "jasmine-console-reporter": "^3.1.0",
    "mocha": "^6.2.0",
    "rimraf": "^2.6.3",
    "rollup": "^1.18.0",
    "rollup-plugin-babel": "^4.3.3",
    "rollup-plugin-json": "^4.0.0",
    "rollup-plugin-node-resolve": "^5.2.0"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "deepmerge": "^4.0.0",
    "get-value": "^3.0.1",
    "json-logic-js": "^1.2.2"
  }
}
name: package.json
